summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ciudad Feria ticket sales application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success). Frontend mostly functional with excellent design implementation. One critical issue found in QR validation page.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error when initializing QR scanner - 'HTML Element with id=qr-reader not found'
ui_bugs.error_details: html5-qrcode library fails to initialize scanner interface

passed_tests: Events listing and filtering by categories
Event detail page with purchase form
Complete ticket purchase flow with QR generation

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (QR validation broken, all other features working)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix QR validation page JavaScript error. The html5-qrcode library is not properly initializing the scanner interface. Check if the library is correctly imported and the DOM element is properly created before scanner initialization.
